member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

The link generator for creating URIs.

member.name: M:SocialConnectAPI.Controllers.CommentController.GetCommentById(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a comment by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the comment to retrieve.
A boolean indicating whether the comment has to be active or not (query parameter).

member.summary: Retrieves an active comment by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the active comment to retrieve.

member.summary: Retrieves comments associated with a user by their user ID.
member.param: The ID of the user whose comments to retrieve.
member.returns: The list of comments associated with the user.

member.name: M:SocialConnectAPI.Controllers.CommentController.GetActiveCommentsByUserId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves active comments associated with a user by their user ID.
member.param: The ID of the user whose active comments to retrieve.
member.returns: The list of active comments associated with the user.

member.summary: Creates a new comment.
member.param: The comment to create.

member.summary: Updates an existing comment.

member.summary: Deletes a comment by its ID.

member.returns: The result of the delete operation.

member.name: M:SocialConnectAPI.Controllers.CommentController.LikeComment(System.Int32,SocialConnectAPI.DTOs.Comments.Patch.Request.LikeCommentRequest)
member.summary: Likes a comment by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the comment to like.
The like post request that contains the ID of the user liking the comment.

member.name: M:SocialConnectAPI.Controllers.CommentController.DislikeComment(System.Int32,SocialConnectAPI.DTOs.Comments.Patch.Request.LikeCommentRequest)
member.summary: Dislikes a comment by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the comment to dislike.
The like post request that contains the ID of the user disliking the comment.

member.summary: Retrieves the allowed HTTP methods for the current endpoint.
